Reviews.Title: Great performance from a 7,200 RPM SAS drive.
Reviews.Author: K. Kammer
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these in a RAID-10.  At moderate load I can hardly tell the difference from much more expensive (and generally lower capacity) 10k drives.  Unless you're running a server that gets a whole lot of simultaneous requests, where the difference might be noticeable, you can't beat the price/performance ratio of these drives.

Reviews.Title: Fast drives on small package
Reviews.Author: Marcelino Maldonado
Reviews.Content: Very fast drives on small package, delivering both 1TB capacities and enterprise reliability in a 2.5 inch format.Great. Fast delivery. Drive caddy are required to install, used this 2 of 2.5'' SAS Hard Drive HDD Tray/Caddy for Dell Poweredge R620, R710, T710, R720, R820Used to add storage capacity to an R610 dell server. I would order this product again.

Reviews.Title: Great christmas gift!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Needed a backup drive for my backup, this and the  Mediasonic ProBox 3.5" SATA Hard Drive Enclosure - USB 3.0 SuperSpeed did the trick and save a bunch of money.Formatting took a while, but now it's quick for copying with the 3.0 USB enclosure.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Great Price
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Great.  Fast delivery.  Best price available.  Installed in minutes.  Used to replace older drives in an old dell server.I would order this product again.
